channel.title: PI Sever problems
channel.description:
Whenever I restart the cmd prompt box or update my server the cmd prompt will open but people can't connect. I then have to restart my vps manually for it to work.
I'm cluseless on what to do.
And now people can't connect after i've restarted my vps
Help please :s

item.title: PI Sever problems
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

This isn’t the V.P.S. section.

Not using PI would be the best solution. You should review your V.P.S. settings, also call your V.P.S. Customer Support.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Sever problems
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Did you modify anything recently? Does this problem occur on a different computer?

Read full topic
